code: import React from'react';import'./triplist.css';import APIService from'./APIService';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TripList(props){function updateTrip(trips){props.updateTrip(trips);}function deleteTrip(trips){APIService.deleteTrip(trips.id).then(()=>props.deleteTrip(trips));}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tripbox",children:props.trips&&props.trips.map(trips=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h5",{children:["Date: ",trips.datecreated," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Frist Name: ",trips.firstname]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[" Last Name: ",trips.lastname]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Source: ",trips.source]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Destination: ",trips.destination]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-md-1",children:[" ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary",onClick:()=>updateTrip(trips),children:"Update"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-danger",onClick:()=>deleteTrip(trips),children:"Delete"})})]})]},trips.id);})});}export default TripList;
